--- select_tablesample_with_subquery.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)

--- AST
&ast.QueryStatement{
  Query: &ast.Select{
    Results: []ast.SelectItem{
      &ast.Star{
        Star: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &ast.From{
      From: 11,
      Source: &ast.SubQueryTableExpr{
        Lparen: 18,
        Rparen: 40,
        Query: &ast.Select{
          Select: 19,
          Results: []ast.SelectItem{
            &ast.Star{
              Star: 26,
            },
          },
          From: &ast.From{
            From: 28,
            Source: &ast.TableName{
              Table: &ast.Ident{
                NamePos: 33,
                NameEnd: 40,
                Name: "Singers",
              },
            },
          },
        },
        Sample: &ast.TableSample{
          TableSample: 42,
          Method: "BERNOULLI",
          Size: &ast.TableSampleSize{
            Lparen: 64,
            Rparen: 75,
            Value: &ast.IntLiteral{
              ValuePos: 65,
              ValueEnd: 67,
              Base: 10,
              Value: "90",
            },
            Unit: "PERCENT",
          },
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM Singers) TABLESAMPLE BERNOULLI (90 PERCENT)
